metadata.name: System Shutdown/Reboot - MacOs
metadata.comment: Adversaries may shutdown/reboot systems to interrupt access to, or aid in the destruction of, those systems.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 2 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/shutdown')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/reboot')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/halt'))))

output.summary: Adversaries may shutdown/reboot systems to interrupt access to, or aid in the destruction of, those systems.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administrative activity Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1529/T1529.md
